data.comment: The match has started.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
In the minute 1, Gamba drive upfield and Shu Kurata gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kawasaki defender.
In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Gamba's half.
In the minute 4, Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Gamba.
In Kawasaki Kawasaki's Ao Tanaka is caught offside.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kawasaki's Ryota Ohshima gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gamba defender.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Gamba a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ryota Ohshima (Kawasaki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Gamba at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Free kick Gamba.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Ao Tanaka for Kawasaki is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Gamba.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 20, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
Akihiro Ienaga (Kawasaki) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Leandro Damiao scores to make it 1-0 at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 22, That's a fine assist from Kyohei Noborizato.
Free kick Gamba.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, Patric for the away team is judged to be offside.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
In the minute 29, Yuichi Nishimura signals a Gamba throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Kawasaki in Kawasaki.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Gamba.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Kawasaki.
In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kawasaki drive forward but Ryota Ohshima is judged offside.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Gamba.
Gamba have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Important block from the Kawasaki defence as Shu Kurata fires in a strike for Gamba.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 40, In Kawasaki, Leandro Damiao of Kawasaki is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Kawasaki's Kaoru Mitoma is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick Kawasaki.
In the minute 42, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kawasaki drives forward and Leandro Damiao gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Goal! Kawasaki extend their lead to 2-0 through Akihiro Ienaga.
Great play from Leandro Damiao to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Kawasaki.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kawasaki.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 48, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
It's now 3-0 in Kawasaki as Akihiro Ienaga scores for Kawasaki.
Kaoru Mitoma with an assist there.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Gamba.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Gamba.
In Kawasaki Kawasaki drive forward through Leandro Damiao. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 53, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
In the minute 56, Kawasaki pushes forward through Akihiro Ienaga, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki's Leandro Damiao gets in a shot on goal at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Kawasaki's Kaoru Mitoma misses with an attempt on goal.
Gamba have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Gamba throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
In the minute 62, Gamba's Ryu Takao has run offside.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Kawasaki's Akihiro Ienaga breaks free at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Gamba at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kawasaki.
In the minute 67, Akihiro Ienaga gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kawasaki.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The away team replace Takashi Usami with Kazuma Watanabe.
In the minute 69, Tsuneyasu Miyamoto (Gamba) is making a second substitution, with Shuhei Kawasaki replacing Shu Kurata.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Kohei Okuno is replacing Yuki Yamamoto for the away team.
In the minute 71, Gamba to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
In Kawasaki, Patric (Gamba) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, Kawasaki take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Akihiro Ienaga.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Gamba are pushing forward but Yuya Fukuda's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 76, Yuichi Nishimura awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Gamba throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
In the minute 78, Dai Tsukamoto is on a sub for Yuya Fukuda for Gamba.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Kawasaki.
Goal kick for Gamba at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 82, Toru Oniki is making the team's first substitution at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium with Reo Hatate replacing Akihiro Ienaga.
Kawasaki make their second substitution with Yu Kobayashi replacing Leandro Damiao.
Shinya Yajima for Gamba drives towards goal at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
The away team have replaced Ryu Takao with Shoji Toyama. This is the fifth substitution made today by Tsuneyasu Miyamoto.
In the minute 86, Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Kengo Nakamura is replacing Kaoru Mitoma for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 87, The home team have replaced Ryota Ohshima with Manabu Saito. This is the fourth substitution made today by Toru Oniki.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Gamba's half.
In Kawasaki Kawasaki attack through Ao Tanaka. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 88, Yuichi Nishimura awards Gamba a goal kick.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Kawasaki.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Patric of Gamba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Full-time! The final score is 5-0.
Great finish from Manabu Saito to give Kawasaki a 5-0 lead.
Reo Hatate instrumental with a fine assist.
Kawasaki make their fifth substitution with Yasuto Wakizaka replacing Ao Tanaka.
